title: [LFM] 2 Gold+ top laners for 2 teams
body:
Hi all my name is Shia LaRedBuff or Abyssial on the forums and i am the OCE Representative for Tenacity Gaming.
As of now we are looking for 2 Top laners to join the two main teams of tenacity, looking to get into a high teir and get the community known.
please only contact if you are a top laner that would wish to join the community and be active.
**MUST NOT BE TOXIC**
thanks and if you have any questions please add me on LoL. 
thanks 
Shia LaRedBuff

replies.body: Still looking for a top laner ? ive added you
UPDATE: just looking for one more top laner

Im a Top Laner are you still looking for one i main 
{{champion:122}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:23}}{{champion:150}}
